changeSet.sql: UPDATE FILE_INTERFACE_CONFIG SET FILE_PREPEND = 'FS', FILE_POSTPEND = '_ALL.' WHERE INTERFACE_TYPE = 'SI'; UPDATE FILE_INTERFACE_CONFIG SET DATE_FORMAT = 'yyMMdd' WHERE INTERFACE_TYPE = 'IPDC';
